_header: Lord Thy flesh was mickle adrede
Subjects: Passion, meditations on; Christ, Passion of
_description: Meditations by the Events of the Passion — eleven 8-line stanzas

BLRoy17Cxvii.First Lines:
Lord þi flesche was mekyl adrydeA gan þat
                    þu suld pyned beOf þe mownt of calueryWen þou preyed to
                    þi fadyr only…
BLRoy17Cxvii.Last Lines:
…Þi mercy es to all freSwete ihesu warne it me
                    noghtIn þat blys þat I owght beTo wylke þu as my saule
                    dere boght
BLRoy17Cxvii.Note:
Follows 2827 with no break in text. The
                    final word of the first line has a ‘y’ written over another letter;
                    since a rubricated bracket links the end of this line with the end of the third,
                    perhaps the original inscription was intended to be altered to
                    ‘adry’?
